description.value:
When an effect forces you to move—such as through a pull, a push, or a slide—you can choose to move 5 feet less than the effect specifies. This means an effect that normally pulls, pushes, or slides a target 5 feet does not force you to move at all.
In addition, when an attack would knock you @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}, you can immediately make a save check to avoid falling prone.
